arts.ttl: Mohamed Salah future: Jurgen Klopp 'considered' signing Man United attacker as replacement in 2022
arts.sum: Manchester United winger Antony has emerged as one of the names who was shortlisted to replace Mohamed Salah at Liverpool in 2022.

arts.ttl: How Antony nearly replaced Mohamed Salah at Liverpool
arts.sum: A report reveals how Antony could have replaced Mohamed Salah at Liverpool before his contract extension in 2022.

arts.ttl: Botswana, Mozambique & Tanzania complete Afcon 2025 field
arts.sum: Botswana, Mozambique and Tanzania become the final three qualifiers for the 2025 Africa Cup of Nations in Morocco.

arts.ttl: Ben Doak Liverpool exit: Transfer away rumoured with Arne Slot unlikely to replace Mohamed Salah with Scotland, Middlesbrough loan star
arts.sum: Ben Doak is likely to leave Liverpool permanently given he could struggle to establish himself in the first XI under Arne Slot ahead of Mohamed Salah and Federico Chiesa.

arts.ttl: Jurgen Klopp 'discussed' replacing Mohamed Salah at Liverpool with Antony
arts.sum: Liverpool could soon be on the lookout for a replacement for Mohamed Salah but ex-Reds boss Jurgen Klopp thought he had the perfect candidate back in 2022

arts.ttl: Mohamed Salah on standby for Liverpool first after Jurgen Klopp decision
arts.sum: Mohamed Salah and Jurgen Klopp won everything there was to win with each other, and the former Liverpool boss could still have an impact on their star man despite Arne Slot being in charge

arts.ttl: Liverpool, Arsenal sent £33.4m transfer warning by Frankfurt chief over Omar Marmoush
arts.sum: Eintracht Frankfurt sporting director Markus Krosche warns Liverpool that a fee of €40m (£33.4m) will not be enough to sign Omar Marmoush next year.

arts.ttl: Report: Liverpool think £600,000 forward could truly replace Mo Salah if he improves his finishing
arts.sum: The future of Mohamed Salah at Liverpool is wrapped up in uncertainty. The Egypt international will become a free agent at the end of the...

arts.ttl: “I hope…” – Mohamed Salah speaks out on what he wants for Liverpool transfer target
arts.sum: Liverpool star Mohamed Salah has spoken out on his fellow countryman Omar Marmoush after his superb form in the Bundesliga this season with Eintracht Frankfurt. The Egypt international looks like he could be the next big star player of his country, following the immense success of Salah in the last decade or so. arts.ttl: Liverpool learn Omar Marmoush price tag as Eintracht Frankfurt rule out cheap sale
arts.sum: Liverpool would have to pay significantly more than market value if they are to launch an approach for Eintracht Frankfurt forward Omar Marmoush, the Bundesliga side have confirmed.
